name: Monopoly
overview: The classic board game of property management, MONOPOLY, comes to the Game Boy Color. Choose from a wide array of tokens including the car, boot, thimble, and dog. When you get out on the board, your goal is to buy three properties of the same color. When another player lands on your property, he or she must pay you rent. Eventually, you will want to improve your property with houses and hotels so you can charge higher rents. The ultimate goal of the game is to drive all of the competition into bankruptcy. The Game Boy Color edition features all of the classic MONOPOLY gameplay and high stakes. There are eight variations of the game you can play: The Big Boys, Trader's Delight, Even Steven, Small Stuff, Money Isn't Everything, Short and Sweet, Building Shortage, and It's a Start. If you don't get this game, you will not be able to pass "Go" or collect $200.
